column5: ~~~~took a drive through town and stopped to take a look just off shore, about 100 yds, someone drove out with their sled and hit some soft ice, you can see where he turned around and came back to shore. Just off the Government dock large area of grey snow, suggesting a lot of slush. So don't be the first one put, there is no reward for it
ummm so people arent even walking on their yet, but some dummy decided to take his sled out there? lol you cant fix stupid or save them from themselves.

i guess some people will never learn thanks for the report tho oldphart thats my go to shore spot in the spring/fall for eyes and crappie thinking about walking out from there for some ice fishing this year as well
